title: Question-Embedded Pre-Class Video Design to Enhance Flipped Learning Effectiveness

context.additional_context: VR-based simulation-driven mathematics education program for general citizens

learning_goals: Learners achieve a 20% improvement in prior knowledge by accessing pre-learning materials at least three times weekly through question-embedded pre-videos.
Learners maintain real-time discussion participation rates above 70% through question review at the start of class.
Learners apply at least 85% of math concepts learned in flipped learning environments to real-world problem-solving via project-based assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
